products.name: Crystal Ball of Future

products.description: Sometimes to answer the question about the future we shall look in the past...

products.description: Poison for Unloved - easy solution for difficult problems!

products.name: Broom 2 in 1
products.description: Broom 2 in 1 for a Clean Flight! Perfect for cleaning and running from chores!

products.name: Poisoned Apple Delivery
products.description: A retired elderly queen will deliver the poisoned apple to your desired destination.

products.description: Ever wanted to marry a prince? Join the lottery and see if you kissed the One!

products.name: WItCH Uber Driver
products.description: Our lovely hundred-year-olds will be glad to transport you wherether it might be. For longer journey we recomend choosing Baba Yaga barrel or hut on chicken legs.

products.name: Insomnia Treatment
products.description: Get a good quality sleep, wherever and whenever you're ment to sleep well!

products.name: Palmistry
